price: 67. Mais l’homme ne se rappelle-t-il pas que Nous l’avons créé une première fois quand il n’était rien ?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: awalā yadhkuru al-insānu annā khalaqnāhu min qablu walam yaku shayan
